session_id.LongName: name of the session. T0 is baseline. T1_GB is the retest at ~ 1.5 years later. Both session are done in the exact same way

frequency.intervention_schedule: for the intensive phase - between session T0 and T1_NT - the rTMS treatment was delivered once a day monday to friday for 3 weeks. In the manteinance phase the rTMS treatment was delivered once every 2 weeks for 6 months.
